official.headline: Hospital Systems Restored
official.anchor_line: Hospital glitches addressed as specialists enhance system stability.
official.contextual_reframing: BCI teams rapidly adapt infrastructure to better serve citizens, ensuring high-quality healthcare remains a priority.

underground.headline: Hospital Chaos Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Hidden BCI flaws erupt, jeopardizing patient safety nationwide.
underground.contextual_reframing: Under the façade of efficiency, crumbling systems put lives at risk — citizens demand accountability.
